modName: Glowing True Master Sword for Relics of Hyrule
summary: A replacer for Relics of Hyrule that makes the True and LTTP variants of the Master Sword glow blue like it does when glowing in Breath of the Wild.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/hx4rHiY.png[/img]
A replacer for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40615/?]Relics of Hyrule[/url] that makes the True and LTTP variants of the Master Sword glow blue like it does when glowing in Breath of the Wild.

I had been playing a bit of Breath of the Wild, as you do, and a friend and I felt the glow would be a nice addition to my [s]collection[/s] Skyrim playthrough (as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85892]Link[/url] of course).  So I made it happen.

[u]An important note:[/u] As always, ENB's can affect the game's appearance immensely, the glow effect is no exception, thus there are four [s]lights[/s] options for the brightness of the glow (chosen during installation).  Another thing to be aware of with glowing items like this, some ENB's change the intensity of glowing objects depending on the [i]time of day[/i], so you may want to adjust that to your liking.




[img]https://i.imgur.com/B3ou5FK.png[/img]
• Original mesh work was done by [url=http://chief-01.deviantart.com/]Chief-01[/url], Relics of Hyrule by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4538474/][b]JKalenad[/b][/url]
author: cube_guy
